import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./searchItem.css"; const SearchItem = ({item,index}) => { const photo = [ "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D", "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618773928121-c32242e63f39?fm=jpg&q=60&w=3000&ixlib=rb-4.1.0&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8aG90ZWx8ZW58MHx8MHx8fDA%3D" ] return (

{item.name}

{item.distance} Free airport taxi Studio Apartment with Air conditioning {item.description} Free cancellation You can cancel later, so lock in this great price today!
{item.rating &&
Excellent
}
${item.cheapestPrice} Includes taxes and fees
); }; export default SearchItem;
